thread.title: Value for money! Small rooms, great location
thread.title_full: Value for money! Small rooms, great location - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marcus E
title: Value for money! Small rooms, great location
text:
The hotel offers good deals when booked well in advance, the rooms are rather small but really modern and clean and the staff friendly and helpful. The shower only has one knob which made using it a bit of and adventure, but in the end I figured that you just have to turn it all the way to the other end to get hot water :)
Room Tip: Ask for a room as high up as possible See more room tips
